label: ProductGroup
comment: The grouping of products, such as for catalogue or regulatory purposes.

datatypeProperties.comment: An identifier for this trade product group.
The name, expressed as text, for this trade product group.

objectProperties.comment: A supply chain trade line item which is included in this trade product group. Trade Line Item and Product are at the same level i.e. 1 for 1

referencedBy.comment: A product group included in this supply chain trade transaction.
